content.question: Which of the following indicates the sign of <math alttext="delta H sub solution" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>o</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ln</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and the number of significant figures that can be reported for the value of <math alttext="delta H sub solution" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi> <mi>H</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>s</mi> <mi>o</mi> <mo>⁢</mo> <mstyle mathvariant="italic"> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mo>⁡</mo> </mrow> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> in the experiment? (Assume that the specific heat of the solution is identical to the specific heat of water.)

choices.label: <math alttext="delta H sub solution is less than 0, 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>o</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ln</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> significant figures

<math alttext="delta H sub solution is less than 0, 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>o</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ln</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> significant figures

<math alttext="delta H sub solution is greater than 0 , 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>o</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ln</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> significant figures

<math alttext="delta H sub solution is greater than 0, 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>o</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ln</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> significant figures

content.answer: <math alttext="delta H sub solution is greater than 0, 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>o</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ln</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> significant figures

skill.text: 2.D: Make observations or collect data from representations of laboratory setups or results, while attending to precision where appropriate.
